messages.subject: RE: [samuraihistory] 2003 Taiga Drama
messages.msgSnippet: ... Tokugawa Ieyasu. ... done Tokugawa ... anything ... It was on the news a week or two ago.  It s not on Ieyasu, I forget the name off the top of my head,
messages.messageBody:
>
> I heard from a friend that next years NHK Taiga drama will be about
Tokugawa Ieyasu.
> She wasn't sure exactly. I thought it odd because they had already
done Tokugawa
> Ieyasu in 1983 as well as 2000s Aoi Tokugawa Sandai. Has anybody heard
anything
> about this?
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

It was on the news a week or two ago. It's not on Ieyasu, I forget the
name off the top of my head, but it is about one of the legendary
swordsmen...

Later, MEH

messages.subject: 2003 Taiga Drama
messages.msgSnippet: I heard from a friend that next years NHK Taiga drama will be about Tokugawa Ieyasu. She wasn t sure exactly. I thought it odd because they had already done
messages.messageBody:
I heard from a friend that next years NHK Taiga drama will be about Tokugawa Ieyasu. She wasn't sure exactly. I thought it odd because they had already done Tokugawa Ieyasu in 1983 as well as 2000s Aoi Tokugawa Sandai. Has anybody heard anything about this?


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
